unnormalised: Mumbai: Box office collections seem to be feeling a little…sluggish after the Onam festivities. Experts are blaming a collective biryani-induced coma amongst cinemagoers.
normalised: Mumbai: Box office collections seem to be feeling a little…sluggish after the Onam festivities. Experts are blaming a collective biryani-induced coma amongst cinemagoers.

unnormalised: Last week's releases, "Pyar ka Parachute" and "Dulhan Weds Dracula," haven't exactly set the Ganges on fire. Early estimates suggest "Pyar ka Parachute," a rom-com filmed entirely in Connaught Place, barely managed Rs. 5 crore.
normalised: Last week's releases, "Pyar ka Parachute" and "Dulhan Weds Dracula," haven't exactly set the Ganges on fire. Early estimates suggest "Pyar ka Parachute," a rom-com filmed entirely in Connaught Place, barely managed rupee five crore.

unnormalised: Meanwhile, "Dulhan Weds Dracula," a horror-comedy starring veteran actor Anupam Kher as the reluctant vampire, fared even worse, reportedly scaring away more viewers than it entertained. Trade analyst Taran Adarsh tweeted, "Audience found the plot more terrifying than the Dracula's teeth!"
normalised: Meanwhile, "Dulhan Weds Dracula," a horror-comedy starring veteran actor Anupam Kher as the reluctant vampire, fared even worse, reportedly scaring away more viewers than it entertained. Trade analyst Taran Adarsh tweeted, "Audience found the plot more terrifying than the Dracula's teeth!"

unnormalised: Industry insiders whisper about upcoming releases, including a biopic on Dabbawalas titled "From VT to Your Tiffin." Will it deliver? Only time, and hopefully not more biryani, will tell. Looks like Bollywood needs a serious jhatka to get back on track!
normalised: Industry insiders whisper about upcoming releases, including a biopic on Dabbawalas titled "From V T to Your Tiffin." Will it deliver? Only time, and hopefully not more biryani, will tell. Looks like Bollywood needs a serious jhatka to get back on track!
